forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of San Francisco, this day unfolds beneath a soft, golden sun, gleaming over the skyline, promising a high of around 69 degrees. The air is brisk, stirred by a west-southwest wind that whispers among the trees, carrying with it the scent of fresh sea salt. As the afternoon approaches, temperatures may dip slightly, caressing the city with a coolness reminiscent of gentle waves lapping at the shore. While a playful breeze dances through the streets, those venturing out will find ample opportunity to enjoy the vibrant yet serene ambiance that this city conveys.

Yet, lurking just beyond the grandeur of the golden arches of the bridge and the majestic hills, the fog, that elusive character of San Francisco, may begin to unfurl its presence later this evening. Clouds drift in gently, hinting at a slight chance of drizzle after midnight, veiling the night in mystery. As the sun dips into its tranquil descent, the cool shadow of evening will bring with it a cozy chill, suggesting a light layer will serve as a perfect companion for an evening stroll or a cozy gathering at a local café. This day beckons one to leave the office behind, perhaps to explore the intertwining streets of the city, take a reflective pause at a park bench adorned with the remnants of bygone times, or simply relish the sunset’s artistry across the bay.
